creator: bmurali04@gmail.com
text:
We are installing apache httpd-2.0.65 in our AIX7.1 server getting below error message

Binary image successfully created...
exec(): 0509-036 Cannot load program ./bindist/bin/httpd because of the following errors:
        0509-022 Cannot load module /softdump/cs/httpd-2.0.65/bindist/lib/libapr-0.so.
        0509-150   Dependent module /opt/freeware/lib/libgcc_s.a(shr.o) could not be loaded.
        0509-103   The module has an invalid magic number.
        0509-022 Cannot load module httpd.
        0509-150   Dependent module /softdump/cs/httpd-2.0.65/bindist/lib/libapr-0.so could not be loaded.
        0509-022 Cannot load module .
Creating supplementary files...
exec(): 0509-036 Cannot load program ./bindist/bin/httpd because of the following errors:
        0509-022 Cannot load module /softdump/cs/httpd-2.0.65/bindist/lib/libapr-0.so.
        0509-150   Dependent module /opt/freeware/lib/libgcc_s.a(shr.o) could not be loaded.
        0509-103   The module has an invalid magic number.
        0509-022 Cannot load module httpd.
        0509-150   Dependent module /softdump/cs/httpd-2.0.65/bindist/lib/libapr-0.so could not be loaded.
        0509-022 Cannot load module .
Creating distribution archive and readme file...
Ready.
You can find the binary archive (../httpd-2.0.65-powerpc-ibm-aix7.1.0.0.tar.gz)
and the readme file (httpd-2.0.65-powerpc-ibm-aix7.1.0.0.README) in the
parent directory.

Please help us to fix the issue ASAP.

Thanks
WONTFIX -- 2.0.x is end of life. We can only provide limited assistance with your chosen build environment -- check the httpd wiki for AIX Platform notes.
creator: covener@gmail.com
